parameters.name: ApisecStatus
parameters.description: The switch of the API security module.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the WAF instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland

parameters.name: Resource
parameters.description: The name of the protected object.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.
